articles.title: Actor Gary Busey charged with sexual offenses at horror film convention
articles.description: New Jersey police said the actor was charged with sexual contact and harassment at a horror film and memorabilia convention.
articles.content:

articles.title: Car bomb kills daughter of 'spiritual guide' to Putin's Ukraine invasion - Russian media
articles.description: Russian authorities said Sunday they had opened a murder investigation after the daughter of influential, ultra-nationalist philosopher Alexander Dugin was killed by a car bomb on the outskirts of Moscow.

articles.title: Zelenskiy warns of 'ugly' Russian attack before Ukraine Independence Day
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy urged vigilance ahead of Wednesday's celebrations of 31 years of Ukraine's independence from Soviet rule, as shells rained down near Europe's biggest nuclear plant and Russian forces struck in the south and east.

articles.title: Somalia hotel siege: Security forces say al-Shabab attack is over
articles.description: Twenty-one people were killed after al-Shabab militants took hostages in a popular Mogadishu hotel.
articles.content:

articles.title: Boat goes up in smoke, sinks on Hudson River
